splitOne.title: University Overview.
splitOne.subTitle: Campus Information
splitOne.desc: Histudy we prepare you to launch your career by providing a supportive, creative, and professional environment from which to learn practical skills, build a network of industry contacts.

list.text: - Over 1.7 billion hours of music played monthly

splitTwo.title: Modern Classrooms Built for Engagement
splitTwo.subTitle: Smart Learning Spaces
splitTwo.desc: The modern classrooms at Aljamea-Tus-Saifiyah are designed to foster an engaging and interactive learning environment, incorporating advanced teaching methodologies and technology. These classrooms balance Islamic studies with modern subjects, preparing students to contribute positively to society.

splitTwo.title: Comfortable Lodging and Boarding Facilities
splitTwo.subTitle: Residential Campus
splitTwo.desc: Aljamea-Tus-Saifiyah Business School provides its students with comprehensive lodging and boarding facilities, including well-furnished hostels, dining halls, laundry services, recreation areas, and prayer roomsâ€”creating a home away from home.

splitTwo.title: Nutritious Meals with Mawaid
splitTwo.subTitle: Three Meals a Day
splitTwo.desc: Students are provided with three nutritious meals a day through Mawaid, ensuring their dietary needs are met in a healthy and balanced manner according to high standards.

splitTwo.title: Vast Library of Knowledge
splitTwo.subTitle: Preserving Heritage and Enabling Research
splitTwo.desc: The Aljamea-Tus-Saifiyah Library in Mumbai houses an extensive collection of rare manuscripts, books, and scholarly texts focused on Islamic teachings. It supports both academic research and the preservation of Dawoodi Bohra linguistic and cultural heritage.
